name: PM-KISAN
description: Financial support for farmers to supplement their income. Provides direct income support to land-holding farmer families.

name: Ayushman Bharat
description: Health insurance scheme for economically vulnerable families. Provides coverage for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
benefit: ₹5 lakh coverage per family per year

name: National Scholarship Portal
description: Scholarships for students from various backgrounds including SC/ST/OBC/Minority communities for higher education.
benefit: Varies by category and level of education (₹5,000 to ₹50,000 per year)
eligibility: Family income below ₹2.5 lakh per annum

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana
description: Housing for all scheme providing financial assistance for constructing houses for urban and rural poor.
benefit: Financial assistance up to ₹2.5 lakh for house construction
eligibility: No pucca house in family name

name: Solar Rooftop Subsidy
description: Subsidy for installing solar panels on residential rooftops to promote renewable energy adoption.
benefit: Up to 40% subsidy on installation costs (up to 3kW)
eligibility: Adequate roof space for solar panels

name: Skill India Programme
description: Vocational training and skill development for youth to enhance employability across various sectors.
benefit: Free training and certification with placement assistance

name: Mudra Loan Scheme
description: Loans for micro and small enterprises to support entrepreneurship and self-employment.
benefit: Loans up to ₹10 lakh without collateral

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Pension scheme for workers in unorganized sector providing guaranteed minimum pension.
benefit: Guaranteed pension of ₹1,000 to ₹5,000 per month after 60 years
eligibility: Not covered under any other social security scheme
